H0.text: The Combination Acts of 1799-1800 were repealed in 1824 – what had they banned. Worker Strikes

H1.text: The Combination Acts of 1799-1800 were repealed in 1824 – what had they banned. Collective Bargaining

H2.text: The Combination Acts of 1799-1800 were repealed in 1824 – what had they banned. Labor Organizations

H3.text: The Combination Acts of 1799-1800 were repealed in 1824 – what had they banned. Unions

A4.text: Prohibited trade unions and collective bargaining by British workers.

A5.text: The legislation drove labour organisations underground.

A6.text: The Combination Act was passed, which banned trade unions and collective bargaining by British workers.
